name: Get Your Head Around These! 2 Quiz | Brain Teasers | 5 Questions

questions.text:
I begin and end with U-N-D.

A subterranean word.

Can you deduce me?

The more I am, the less you see.

Strange result - What can I be?
questions.correct: darker & darkness & dark & black & empty & fog & blindness & smoke & transparent & blind & night & absent & blackness & invisibility
questions.explanation: darker & darkness & dark & black & empty & fog & blindness & smoke & transparent & blind & night & absent & blackness & invisibility.

questions.text:
I can only be kept if I'm given first.

This does not work if the order's reversed.

I am a ______? (Read the hint)
questions.correct: promise & gift & secret & trust & present & oath & word & vow&rule
questions.explanation: promise & gift & secret & trust & present & oath & word & vow&rule.

questions.text:
At both extremes of the day,

I'm the same distance away.

I look the same from each end.

High time you solved me my friend.
questions.explanation:
noon.

	Noon is the centre of the day and being a palindrome it reads the same from both ends.

questions.text:
Seen in one form at night, and another by day.

By night I'm at flight, by day used for play.
questions.explanation:
a bat & bat.

	By night : bat, the flying mammal.By day : baseball bat, cricket bat, etc.
